product_details.description: Plus-up your day with Galaxy AI on Galaxy S24+. Wonder where your favorite influencer got their shoes? Simply Circle to Search* with Google to see where you can buy your own pair. Then snap a photo to show off your new kicks and elevate your pic from good to great on Galaxy S24+.  Before you head out in style, call up that new authentic Japanese restaurant to make a reservation and impress the staff as you use Live Translate* to speak their language in real time. And with our most powerful processor yet, you can smoothly switch between texting friends, taking photos of your food and searching for your next culinary adventure.  With Galaxy AI on GalaxyS24+, life just got a whole lot easier —and a lot more fun. Epic, just like that.

banner_details:
This modern promotional banner features a sleek smartphone centered prominently on a layered, abstract background with wave-like and circular shapes. The backdrop transitions from a light gray upper section to a deep slate blue lower section, creating distinct visual depth. The main headline (`heading`) is placed at the top with a futuristic, sans-serif typeface, followed by a tagline (`subheading`) using a bold display font. Centered beneath the product image (`product_image`) is the price tag (`price`) in white, bold font for maximum contrast. A rectangular call-to-action button (`cta_button`) in bright blue with white text (`cta`) is positioned at the bottom center. 

**Color Palette:**
- Light Gray: `#E8E9EA`
- Medium Gray: `#D1D3D4`
- Dark Gray: `#303641`
- Steel Blue: `#424750`
- Accent Blue: `#4285F4`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek and modern smartphone design with a minimalistic yet premium color palette. Dominated by soft matte silver (#E6E6E6) on the body, it creates a clean and high-end feel. The camera rings and lenses are a deep black (#000000), providing contrast and visual focus. The screen displays light, ethereal hues including pale yellow (#F5EBAA), soft gray (#CFCFCF), and silvery white (#F9F9F9) with a glittering effect, subtly blending together to form a dreamy, futuristic backdrop. This harmonious color blend balances elegance with innovation, making it ideal for tech advertising that emphasizes minimalism and sophistication.
